alert.note: Alert for Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 6:44PM EDT until July 06 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wake County in central North Carolina... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 644 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Wake Forest to 8 miles east of Raleigh, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Wake Forest, Zebulon, Knightdale, Wendell, Rolesville, Falls Lake, Falls Lake State Rec Area, Falls Lake Boat Ramp and Purnell. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
